history.content:
Hi there, 

That plan has me quite concerned. We really discourage students from taking more than one technical in a term. Sounds like you're planning to take two, including one that you need for the GPA cap and two that you have maybe struggled with in the past. Students often think that repeating courses will be easy because they've seen the material before, but we see that not being true. I would really encourage you to pick one course, and maybe switch the other for a P/NP breadth. Feel free to schedule an appointment with us if you want to discuss your summer/fall plans futher: https://berkeleycs.youcanbook.me/

You should also make sure you understand how your previous grade in CS 61A will affect your GPA cap calculation @3105

I am retaking cs61a over the summer as well as math 54.

However I also am working at a start-up this summer. Can anyone tell me how bad it would be for me to not attend lecurrs/discussions for both 61A and math 54?

And yes, I intend to declare CS.
history.subject: Summer session CS61a attendance
